metadata.name: CobaltStrike Service Installations - System
metadata.comment: Detects known malicious service installs that appear in cases in which a Cobalt Strike beacon elevates privileges or lateral movement

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('admin$')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('%comspec%')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('start')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('powershell -nop -w hidden -encodedcommand')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('suvyichozxctt2jqzwn0ie5ldc5xzwjjbgllbnqplkrvd25sb2fku3ryaw5nkcdodhrwoi8vmti3ljaumc4xo')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('lfwcaotmv3lu9iamvjdcbozxquv2viy2xpzw50ks5eb3dubg9hzfn0cmluzygnahr0cdovlzeyny4wljaumt')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('jrvggke5ldy1pymply3qgtmv0lldlymnsawvudckurg93bmxvywrtdhjpbmcoj2h0dha6ly8xmjcumc4wlje6'))))

output.summary: Detects known malicious service installs that appear in cases in which a Cobalt Strike beacon elevates privileges or lateral movement
